short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reloads the current tab group using a right click context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension offers the functionality of reloading/refreshing only the current tab group through a right-click context menu. In cases where the target tab is not part of a tab group, the extension refreshes all ungrouped tabs instead.

This can be used to refresh or update tab groups for news, shopping, jobs, forums, or any other use without refreshing other tab groups and ungrouped tabs.
